definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: She clocked 11.6 seconds for the 80-metres hurdles.
sentences.chinese: 她八十米跨栏用了十一秒零点六的时间。

sentences.english: Hi, Lucy. Did you see Liuxiang's hurdle race?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，露西，你昨天看刘翔的跨栏比赛了吗？

sentences.english: Hurdling is something that involves my whole body being stretched and contorted in quick bursts.
sentences.chinese: 跨栏赛跑需要在快速的冲刺中拉伸和扭曲整个身体。

sentences.english: A runner passed me, then another and another. Over the hurdles they flew.
sentences.chinese: 运动员一个接一个超过我，如飞跨栏而去。

sentences.english: Fixed a crash when tabbing out of the game while no sound device is attached to the system.
sentences.chinese: 修正了在跨栏的游戏而没有声音设备连接到系统中。

sentences.english: She learnt to hurdle by leaping over bales of hay on her family's farm.
sentences.chinese: 她通过在自家农场里跳跨干草捆学会了跨栏。

sentences.english: Liu Xiang is the beginning of this century of well-known 110-meter hurdler.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔是本世纪初国内外著名的110米跨栏选手。

sentences.english: Turns out, the person who eventually shattered this barrier was actually a loser.
sentences.chinese: 结果是，谁最终弄倒了跨栏谁就是失败者。

sentences.english: Hurdling events are dashes in which competitors must clear a series of ten barriers called hurdles.
sentences.chinese: 在跨栏跑项目中运动员需要跨过十个栏。

sentences.english: In addition, races are run over hurdles and barriers from 110meters.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有跨栏和障碍赛跑110米栏。

sentences.english: B. Basic conditioning is very important to good hurdling .
sentences.chinese: 基础训练对跨栏非常重要。

sentences.english: In the end, Liuxiang succeeded in winning the first place at the 100-metre hurdle race.
sentences.chinese: 最终，刘翔在百米跨栏赛跑中成功卫冕冠军。

sentences.english: Leo: Hi, Lucy. Did you see Liuxiang's hurdle race?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，露西，你昨天看刘翔的跨栏比赛了吗？

sentences.english: The photo captures a key moment when he was striving to cross one hurdle, concentrating all his attention and strength.
sentences.chinese: 照片抓住了刘翔集中所有力量正在跨栏的精彩时刻。

sentences.english: A case in point is the world famous star hurdle r, Liu Xiang.
sentences.chinese: 一个恰当的例子是世界著名的跨栏赛跑明星刘翔。
